summary: A Player Home set into a rock hill in the reach, East of Markarth beside a tranquil pond and a mysterious mound.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b][color=#00ff00]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/nTqxim2.jpg[/img][/center]


Description

[/color][/b][/size][color=#ff0000][i]* Special Edition Update in Optional Files, Drop the data folder into Skyrim Special Edition Directory[/i].[/color]

A Player Home set into a rocky hill in the reach, beside a tranquil pond and near to a mysterious mound. 

Note: This home is a combination of: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56997]Windwall Burrow[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58119]Reach Pond burrow[/url][size=3][b]

[/b][/size][b]Two versions of the home are available, the standard version, or one for those using Sexy Windhelm V2.
Only use one of these files.[/b]


Dragonborn DLC is required for both files and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7178/]Sexy Windhelm V2[/url] is also required for the optional file.


[center]
[b][u]Cleaned With TES5Edit[/u][/b][/center]
[size=3][b][color=#00ff00]
House Ownership[/color][/b] 

[/size]The key can be located in the bird nest, under the tree beside the pond.

[b][color=#00ff00][size=3]

Features

[/size][/color][/b]- Enchanting, Alchemy and Smithing needs met
- All interior storage is safe and non respawning, exterior trash barrel will repawn and has audible warning
- Named storage, ideal for ocd types like myself
- Sleeps up to 3 followers in main house (My Home Is Your Home Recommended)
- Sleep up to 3 addition followers in Guest Suite (My Home Is Your Home Recommended) 
- Armory with 3 Mannequins, Weapon Racks for 15 weapons and 6 Display Cases
- Forge allows skyforge weapon creation 
- Follower friendly and fully navmeshed
- Bath Areas with much requested Auto Undress / Dress Script.
- Roof Terrace seating area
- Frostfall Friendly
- Realistic Needs And Diseases Friendly 

[size=3][b][center]A Tour of Reach Rock Hollow

[youtube]Mkhll4Tx-L8[/youtube]

A Tour of Reach Rock Hollow (Sexy Windhelm V2 Option)

[youtube]n0YO8tjFoE4[/youtube][/center][/b][/size]
[size=3][b][color=#00ff00]
Installation[/color]

[/b][/size]Download with NNM or your preferred Mod Manager recommended[size=3][b]
[/b][/size][size=3][b]
[color=#00ff00]Uninstall

[/color][/b][/size]Please make sure all items and followers have been removed then Uninstall mod with NNM or your preferred Mod Manager recommended.

[size=3][b][color=#00ff00]

Compatibility[/color]

[/b][/size]No conflicts should be found unless exterior cell is used by another mod.

* Note * Mannequins may do their normal wandering shenanigans at times. 

[color=#00ff00][size=3][b]Incompatibility [/b]

[/size][/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58119]Reach Pond Burrow
[/url]
 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56997]Windwall Burrow

[/url]
[b][size=3][color=#00ff00]

Additional Information[/color]

[/size][/b]The home is set as player faction ownership, to allow ease of use with idle markers and furniture for recommended mods, such as My Home Is Your Home.

Lighting lvls / hue will vary depending on your set up. I use a subtle enb with enhanced light and effects and use the optional darkening plugin.

This is not and will not be made to support Hearthfire adoption / family.

Please do not activate fertile soil in the snowberry planters on the roof terrace, doing so will make your PC explode,
or if you are lucky it will just make the soil clip through the planter.

Can you change this that or the other, or build me a cage for my pet troll? No sorry. I will only change something as a bug fix.

Small clipping is present with entrance door.
[color=#00ff00]
[/color][b][size=3][color=#00ff00]

Recommended Mods[/color]

[/size][/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18045/]My Home Is Your Home[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8655]Smim[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/607/]Skyrim HD 2K Textures
[/url]
[size=3][b][color=#00ff00]

Credits[/color]
[/b][/size]
Modders Resources Courtesy Of:
Blary 
Eldiabs 
Lilith 
InsanitySorrow 
tueffelachtein



[size=4][center]
GAMING, GADGETS AND ENTERTAINMENT[/center][/size][center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Tah2k8Y.jpg[/img]
[url=http://WWW.WHITENOISE-ONLINE.CO.UK]
[size=5]WWW.WHITENOISE-ONLINE.CO.UK[/size][/url][/center]
